page.title: 09PARKHAM 2
page.content: A horse chestnut tree is growing in the centre of the village green and behind it is St James' Church. On the village green there is a seat, next to the seat is a telephone box, a post box and a noticeboard.In the North East corner of the green are two roads: the right hand one goes towards Bideford, the left hand one continues through the village. The road on the left leads past the coffin_makers on the right and the butchers on the left. The road turns sharp left past the farm that supplies the village milk and on towards the Methodist Chapel.
